item.title: continuous integration
item.description: what # Continuous integration (CI) is the practice in software engineering, of merging all developer working copies into a single integrated Environment several times a day.

item.title: cloud computing
item.description: what # The concept of cloud computing has existed for 50 years, since the beginning of the Internet.
